ygData.subject: Re: Honey I'm Home
ygData.msgSnippet: Hours had passed and the three mutants prepared themselves for thier next assignment, a search and rescue mission for Silver Scout. In the lab they were met by

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Hours had passed and the three mutants prepared themselves for thier next a=
ssignment, a search and rescue mission for Silver Scout. In the lab they we=
re met by Veratis and Foxfingers.

"Going out so soon?" Veratis asked foldi=
ng his wings around him like a cape covering him down to his feet. "Whereve=
r to?"

Lunarpine sensed the sarcasm in the old bots voice, he knew that th=
e scientist wasn't about to volenteer any information. "Is there anything y=
ou'd like to tell us?" he asked adding a little sarcasm of his own. "Like w=
hat you've been experimenting on while we were away?" the wolfbot had had e=
nough of Veratis' secrets to last a lifetime, they were all in the middle o=
f a war, there wasn't room for secrecy.

Veratis removed an arm from under =
his cape, so you found out about Silver Scout." He paused for a moment, "If=
 you wanted to know badly enough all you would've had to do was check the f=
iles."

"And what about Megaton? Is he in your files too?" Lunarpine alread=
y checked the computer so he knew that Veratis had hidden the file. "We met=
 him on our last trip to the CF."

Veratis didn't know what to say, he didn=
't expect the group to want so many answers at once. "Science my friend, is=
 trial and error, you three were a success, Megaton was a failure."

Ice st=
epped in before Lunarpine could lose his temper any more than he already ha=
d. "Save it for later you to, we have something else to think about now." a=
s always Ice was the voice of reason that balanced Lunarpines rage. "We're =
going after Silver Scout, we'll start at Alliance island, then double back =
OK?" she was trying more to stop the arguments than come up with a good pla=
n.

"Veratis knew that his mutants had the skills they needed to survive bu=
t there was one more thing that could be added. "Take foxfingers with you."=


Foxfingers snapped up in response to hearing his name, "You want me going=
 with them?" he was surprised that he was being sent on this type of missio=
n, usually the only thing he was used for was an errand boy.

"Of course I =
do." veratis wanted the mission to be a success to make sure that nobody el=
se got control of his virus. "They may be needing your particular skills."
=

Again Foxfingers seemed surprised, after all the time Veratis had tried to=
 break him of his thieving ways now he was being sent to use them. "If you =
need to get in somewhere you're not supposed to be I'm sure he'll be able t=
o get you there." Veratis' logic couldn't be argued with, the three others =
all knew he was right.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
=
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, June 29, 2001 4:58 PM
  Subje=
ct: Honey I'm Home


  Ice and Lunarpine arrive at Veratis' base in Norway =
Razor Claw stands at one of the control consoles pushing buttons with his s=
hort Raptor arms. "Lousy fragging scrap." he yells after again hitting a wr=
ong button. Lunarpine enters the lab, Ice right behind him in Polar bear fo=
rm carrying the stasis locked Grizzltron.

  "Open a CR chamber so we can p=
ut him in." Lunarpine requests moving closer to Razor Claw.

  "Open it you=
r own damn self, I'm done here." the frustrated raptorbot states as he turn=
s to leave. Lunarpine steps to the console and opens a chamber. 
   
  Ice =
pushes the stasis locked bot into the chamber, it closes and fills with the=
 fluid necessary for recovery. "Where are the others?" Ice asks, wondering =
how the other mutant had gotten put in charge.

  "Foxfingers and Veratis a=
re asleep." he pauses at the door, turning back "Oh, either of you know any=
thing about another mutant?" He waits to continue as Lunarpine and Ice exch=
ange confused looks. "I've been checking out the protoforms and ones missin=
g. The computer says her names Silver Scout. According to the DNA sequencer=
s she was cloned from a sample that Foxfingers brought back, and his daught=
ers."

  Lunarpine found the information Razor Claw was referring to. "A wo=
lf and a hawk." he said out loud while thinking "I like her already." a tho=
ught he quickly regretted when Ice mentally "reminded" him where his spark =
belonged. "Her last report came from Alliance Island, she last reported a w=
olf entering and almost immediately leaving." (Kit Kat 2 and 3 switching pl=
aces.) "She followed it and hasn't reported since." Lunarpine knew what tha=
t meant, he also knew what Ice was thinking before even she did. "I guess i=
t's settled then, I'm gonna rest then head back out." 

  Ice opened her mo=
uth to speak only to be interupted by Lunarpine mimicing her at the same ti=
me "Not without me you're not." they both said. Lunarpine could tell by Ice=
s mood that there were other feelings governing her decision to go. Concern=
 for him was on top but not the only reason. He could also sense a fear of =
losing him to the Alliance or worse. jealosy for the possability of losing =
him to Silver Scout.

  "OK then it's settled." Razor Claw chimed in, "We r=
est, then we go find our lost friend." he stepped back toward the door, "Yo=
u're not leaving me home again." Before the others could object  Razor Claw=
 transformed to Wolverine and shot out of the room like a flash bulb going =
off.



  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Servi=
ce.
